name: Toki Tori
synopsis: He may be a small, yellow chicken, but Toki Tori is no coward! He's the hero of this egg-cellent puzzle platformer in which he must rescue all his kidnapped brothers and sisters, still in their fragile eggs. In this Game Boyâ„¢ Color classic, you must keep Toki Tori safe, avoiding monsters and traps, while working out how to collect all the eggs in each level before the timer runs out. Luckily, there are lots of items to aid Toki Tori's mission; so what are you waiting for? Time to get cracking!
